amendment.description: Providing for the sine die adjournment of the first session of the One Hundred Eighth Congress.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2217 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2217 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Craig. (consideration: CR S15927; text: CR S15927) Providing for the sine die adjournment of the first session of the One Hundred Eighth Congress.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2217 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Craig.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2217 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
